Arcadia.KWHY-TV: KWHY-TV, virtual channel 22 (UHF digital channel 42), is a Spanish-language independent television station licensed to Los Angeles, California, United States. The station is owned by Meruelo Broadcasting as part of a duopoly with Garden Grove-licensed KBEH (channel 63), which currently airs paid programming; the two stations share channel 42 under a channel sharing agreement. KWHY and KBEH share studios on West Pico Boulevard in the Mid-City section of Los Angeles and transmitter facilities atop Mount Harvard.
